participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of coming out to my parents because they might not be accepting.
I sometimes forget to walk my dogs, which I know is not good for them.
i read tons of books.
people don t like me too much but i like them anyways.
My favorite TV shows are ones that make me laugh and forget about my troubles.

participant_2.background:
I take a lot of pride in my appearance, even though I'm not the most outgoing person.
I drive a classic car because it reminds me of my family's history.
i like collecting rocks.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
I'm an artist who draws my friends as my little pony characters.

content.text: I'm doing alright. I am a bit tired though. I spent a long time working on an art piece for my friend.
Oh cool! What kind of art did you make?
I drew my friend as a My Little Pony character. She loved it!
That sounds really cute! I wish I could draw. I can read a lot though, so I always have something to do.
Reading is great! I love reading too. I just finished a book about sustainable living.
That sounds really interesting! I try to be more environmentally conscious, but it can be hard.
It can be hard, but it's definitely worth it! I try to recycle as much as I can, and I don't drive much.
I do the same. I try to walk or bike everywhere I can. I also try to buy things that are made from recycled materials.
That's awesome! I love seeing people who are trying to make a difference.
Thanks! I just try to do my part.
You're welcome! I'm sure you're making a difference, even if it's small.
Thanks for making me feel good about myself! I hope you have a good day!
You're welcome! You have a good day too
